data.title: A Connecticut Yankee in King Arthur's court. By Mark Twain
data.meta_description: New York: Charles L. Webster & Co., 1889. First edition, first state of the caption on p. 59 with the s-like ornament between the two words, square 8vo, pp. 575, 1 , 2 ads; illus. in the text throughout, a number of them full-p.; early owner's rubberstamp on front free endpaper, extremities very slightly worn, original pictorial green cloth stamped in gilt, black, and gray; near fine, sound copy. BAL 3429. Item #30178
data.text: New York: Charles L. Webster & Co., 1889. First edition, first state of the caption on p. 59 with the s-like ornament between the two words, square 8vo, pp. 575, [1], [2] ads; illus. in the text throughout, a number of them full-p.; early owner's rubberstamp on front free endpaper, extremities very slightly worn, original pictorial green cloth stamped in gilt, black, and gray; near fine, sound copy. BAL 3429. Item #30178
